trans-unit.source: Represents a transformation that is a composite of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> children in its <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个转换，它是复合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>子级在其<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This class is useful when grouping transformations that are applied to some objects in a scene but not others.
trans-unit.target: 对适用于在场景而不是其他某些对象的转换进行分组时，此类很有用。

trans-unit.source: It also allows developers to re-use transformations by defining them once and then adding them to different Transform3DGroup objects.
trans-unit.target: 它还允许开发人员能够重新使用通过一次定义它们，然后将它们添加到不同的 Transform3DGroup 对象的转换。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空集合。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup.Children*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the transformation is affine.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否仿射转换。

trans-unit.source: True if the transformation is affine; false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 转换为仿射; 如果为 truefalse 否则为。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref> ，该值指示当前的转换值。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D that indicates the current transform value.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D，该值指示当前的转换值。
